column5: For the summer at least, I've made a change to the Esox Angler Magazine Contest.  No more skill testing questions...  lol.. (AND you can enter EVERY DAY.. once per day please)  The winners will be announced at the end of every month!      Good luck...
Hi,  No sense having to worry about anything skillful during fishing season TJ. Got better things to do certainly  Thanks for setting this up for OFNER's  Pete
